header_text: You are making a romantic dinner with your partner, and you want to make your family's macaroni casserole to bring. You have the recipe your parents gave you, but you worry you don't have the cooking skills to pull off the dish.

elements.Text: Do you think your partner will like your casserole?

elements.name: You are making a romantic dinner with your partner, and you want to make your family's macaroni casserole to bring. You have the recipe your parents gave you, but you worry you don't have the cooking skills to pull off the dish._Romantic Relationships_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
